titles.title: United States-India Nuclear Cooperation Approval and Nonproliferation Enhancement Act
United States-India Nuclear Cooperation Approval and Nonproliferation Enhancement Act
An original bill to approve the United States-India Agreement for Cooperation on Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy, and for other purposes.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Dodd. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1048.
